channel.title: Random Help
channel.description:
I am trying to make the server outwrite the result of a misc.random..
If I were to have a code like this..
[code]c.forcedChat("There is a "+ Misc.random(100) +"% chance I could win");[/code]
and I want to server to write out whatever the person gets and I have the code
[code]playerPercent = Misc.random(100);[/code]
But it comes out different numbers.
How could I get playerPercent to equal the number that the player originally gets?

item.title: Random Help
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Zoft™, post:1, topic:433281”]I am trying to make the server outwrite the result of a misc.random…

If I were to have a code like this…

and I want to server to write out whatever the person gets and I have the code

But it comes out different numbers.

How could I get playerPercent to equal the number that the player originally gets?[/quote]

misc.random(); will always output different numbers. try to make it an int:

[code]
int randomNumber = Misc.random(100);

c.forcedChat(“There is a “+ randomNumber +”% chance I could win”);[/code]
or something along those lines.

Read full topic
